dicomreader

Class DicomReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dicomreader.DicomReader

  • public class DicomReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The DicomReader class decodes Dicom files writing headers file and images files. The image(s) files is simply composed of ascii pixel values ordered by rows and columns as in a trivial image.
    Version:
    1.3.3
    Author:
    Salvatore La Bua slabua (at) gmail.com
    See Also:
    LoadDict

      The Image private class is an utility class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DicomReader

        public DicomReader(java.io.File dfn,
                   java.io.File hfn,
                   java.io.File afn,
                   java.io.File ifn)
        Four parametrs DicomReader class constructor. The constructor simply initializes variables' values to file names passed as parameters to the class.
        Parameters:
        dfn - File Dicom file name to decode.
        hfn - File Headers file name.
        afn - File Ascii image file name.
        ifn - File PGM-P2 image file name.

      • DicomReader

        public DicomReader(java.io.File dfn,
                   java.io.File hfn,
                   java.io.File afn)
        Three parametrs DicomReader class constructor. The constructor simply initializes variables' values to file names passed as parameters to the class.
        Parameters:
        dfn - File Dicom file name to decode.
        hfn - File Headers file name.
        afn - File Ascii image file name.

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public void decode()
        The decode method is the main method of the class. It will use other private methods to do the more simplest functions such as checks, informations reading/writing...

      • getFileName

        private java.io.File getFileName()
        Deprecated. It isn't still in use.
        The getFileName method shows a file chooser dialog window to select the file we wish to analyse.
        Returns:
        fileName File File name to analyse.

      • checkDICM

        private java.io.FileInputStream checkDICM(java.io.FileInputStream df)
        The chechDICM method checks if the chosen file has the "DICM" header and acts to handle the file recognized.
        Parameters:
        df - FileInputStream File to check.
        Returns:
        dicomFile FileInputStream File eventually updated.

      • nextTagID

        private java.lang.String nextTagID(java.io.FileInputStream df)
        The nextTagID method contructs the identifying string of the Dicom tag that will be searched into the Dicom dictionary to obtain its description.
        Parameters:
        df - FileInputStream File to check.
        Returns:
        tagID String Current tag representative string.

      • readBytes

        private int readBytes(java.io.FileInputStream df,
                      java.lang.String tID,
                      java.lang.String tVR)
        The readBytes method determines how many bytes must be read from time to time during the Dicom file's headers analysis.
        Parameters:
        df - FileInputStream File to check.
        tID - String Current tag representative string.
        Returns:
        readBytes int Number of bytes to read.

      • lastTagHandling

        private java.lang.String lastTagHandling()
        The lastTagHandling method handles the last header's tag that requires a different treatment than others.
        Returns:
        sValue String Last tag's numeric value.

      • storeImageParam

        private void storeImageParam(java.lang.String tID,
                             java.lang.String sV)
        The storeImageParam method sets the Image object's fields. It will contain some informations to store the image, such as dimensions, color depth and so on.
        Parameters:
        tID - String Current tag representative string.
        sV - String Value to store into the object's attribute.
        See Also:
        DicomReader.Image

      • storeData

        private void storeData(boolean pgm)
        The storeData method recognizes Dicom files with more than one slice and executes the saveImage method to obtain the right number of image files.
        Parameters:
        pgm - boolean If true the method will insert the PGM-P2 headers into the image file.

      • saveImage

        private void saveImage(java.lang.String asciiFN,
                       java.lang.String imageFN,
                       boolean pgm)
        The saveImage method stores the image or the images that are into the Dicom file to a pure ASCII text, ordering pixel values into rows and columns as in a trivial image.
        Parameters:
        asciiFN - String Ascii image file name.
        imageFN - String PGM-P2 image file name.
        pgm - boolean If true the method will insert the PGM-P2 headers into the image file.

      • getIsDicomFile

        public boolean getIsDicomFile()
        The method returns the isDicomFile variable value. True is returned if the file to convert is recognized as a valid Dicom file.
        Returns:
        isDicomFile boolean isDicomFile variable value.

      • getHeadersSaved

        public boolean getHeadersSaved()
        The method returns the headersSaved variable value. True is returned if the headers file is stored.
        Returns:
        headersSaved boolean headersSaved variable value.

      • getAsciiSaved

        public boolean getAsciiSaved()
        The method returns the asciiSaved variable value. True is returned if the ascii image file is stored.
        Returns:
        asciiSaved boolean asciiSaved variable value.

      • getImageSaved

        public boolean getImageSaved()
        The method returns the imageSaved variable value. True is returned if the pgm image file is stored.
        Returns:
        imageSaved boolean imageSaved variable value.

      • getAppVersion

        public static java.lang.String getAppVersion()
        The method returns the version variable value.
        Returns:
        version String Application's version number.

      • decode

        public static void decode(java.io.File dfn,
                          java.io.File hfn,
                          java.io.File afn,
                          java.io.File ifn)
        Four parameters static method of the decode method.
        Parameters:
        dfn - File Dicom file name to decode.
        hfn - File Headers file name.
        afn - File Ascii image file name.
        ifn - File PGM-P2 image file name.

      • decode

        public static void decode(java.io.File dfn,
                          java.io.File hfn,
                          java.io.File afn)
        Three parameters static method of the decode method.
        Parameters:
        dfn - File Dicom file name to decode.
        hfn - File Headers file name.
        afn - File Ascii image file name.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main methods of the class simply calls the decode static method.
        Parameters:
        dicomF - File Dicom file name to decode.
        headersF - File Headers file name.
        asciiF - File Ascii image file name.
        imageF - File PGM-P2 image file name.
